attributes.action: Ban the use of Fluoride in all UK Drinking Water
attributes.additional_details:
Sodium Fluoride is a known health hazard, lowering IQ, damaging teeth and calcifying the Pineal gland. It may also cause birth defects and congenital conditions.

We don't want it in our drinking water - dosage cannot be controlled and we believe it is toxic.

We would like this debated in parliament together with a full investigation into how it was ever permitted in the first place.

rejection.details:
Please see:

Fluoride in the water supply
